bodyPatterns.equalTo:
name: "9222e49c-7292-3554-bd13-122284a488c3"

releases:
  - name: pxc
    version: latest

stemcells:
  - alias: ubuntu
    os: ubuntu-xenial
    version: latest

instance_groups:
  - name: "test_pxc"
    azs: [z1]
    instances: 1
    vm_type: "77ee34cd-f079-4847-8461-cb1e76bb1705"
    stemcell: ubuntu
    networks:
      - name: "77ee34cd-f079-4847-8461-cb1e76bb1705"
    jobs:
      - name: pxc-mysql
        release: pxc
        properties:
          admin_password: ((cf_mysql_mysql_admin_password))
          tls:
            galera: ((galera_server_certificate))
            server: ((mysql_server_certificate))

update:
  canaries: 1
  max_in_flight: 6
  serial: false
  canary_watch_time: 1000-60000
  update_watch_time: 1000-60000

variables:
- name: cf_mysql_mysql_admin_password
  type: password
- name: pxc_galera_ca
  type: certificate
  options:
    is_ca: true
    common_name: pxc_galera_ca
- name: pxc_server_ca
  type: certificate
  options:
    is_ca: true
    common_name: pxc_server_ca
- name: galera_server_certificate
  type: certificate
  options:
    ca: pxc_galera_ca
    extended_key_usage: [ "server_auth", "client_auth" ]
    common_name: galera_server_certificate
- name: mysql_server_certificate
  type: certificate
  options:
    ca: pxc_server_ca
    common_name: mysql_server_certificate
